hero.badge: Your path to emotional resilience starts here
hero.title: Grow Stronger
hero.description: Feel blessed and empowered as you grow in faith and resilience. Find Gospel wisdom, caring groups, and turn challenges into strength.

element1.title: Faith-Based Lessons
element1.description: Learn emotional resilience through inspired courses

element2.title: Faith-Based Community
element2.description: Connect with others who share your values and experiences

element3.title: Personal Growth
element3.description: Share your story and inspire others on their journey

features.title: Built for Your
features.description: Our platform combines science-backed techniques with community support to help you build lasting resilience.

feature1.title: Expert-Designed Courses
feature1.description: Learn from psychologists and resilience experts through bite-sized, actionable lessons.

feature2.title: Community Support
feature2.description: Connect with others on similar journeys through local groups and online communities.

feature3.title: Personal Growth
feature3.description: Track your progress and celebrate milestones on your journey to emotional resilience.

howItWorks.title: Your Journey in
howItWorks.subtitle: A Christ-centered approach to build resilience, together.

step1.title: Study Official Lessons
step1.description: Work through short, inspired courses from The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints that teach emotional resilience rooted in Gospel principles.

step2.title: Connect With Others
step2.description: Find a local ward or branch, or join an online group, to share experiences, uplift one another, and grow in faith together.

step3.title: Share Your History
step3.description: Encourage others by sharing how your faith and the community have helped you overcome challenges. Anonymous or open—your story matters.

transformationStories.title: Stories of Resilience
transformationStories.subtitle: Hear from fellow members and friends how Gospel principles strengthened them in hard times.

testimonial1.quote: Losing my job was heartbreaking. Studying the LDS resilience lessons gave me hope and practical tools to manage my anxiety. My faith has never been stronger.
testimonial1.author: Michael J.

testimonial2.quote: During my divorce, the ward support I found here became my rock. Knowing others prayed for me and shared their stories lifted my spirit daily.
testimonial2.author: Sarah R.

testimonial3.quote: I struggled with anxiety for years. These courses, paired with my testimonies of the Savior’s love, helped me find lasting peace and confidence.
testimonial3.author: David T.

featuredCourses.title: Featured LDS Courses
featuredCourses.subtitle: Inspired lessons from the Church to build your emotional resilience.

course1.title: Foundations of Spiritual Resilience
course1.description: An official Church course on Gospel principles that strengthen your heart and mind.

course2.title: Embracing Change with Faith
course2.description: Learn LDS teachings and practical strategies to navigate life’s transitions with confidence in the Lord.

course3.title: Building a Supportive Ward Network
course3.description: Official guidance on creating Christ-centered connections that uplift and sustain you.

communityStories.title: Community Testimonies
communityStories.subtitle: True accounts of faith, hope, and resilience from our members and friends.

story1.title: Strength After Loss
story1.excerpt: When I lost my job, I leaned on the Gospel-based courses and ward prayers. I found peace and a renewed sense of purpose...

story2.title: Small Steps in Faith
story2.excerpt: I took one inspired step each day, applying principles from the Foundations course and relying on prayer. Over time, my anxiety lessened significantly...

cta.title: Join Us in Building Resilience
cta.description: Sign up for free to access official Church courses, connect with your ward, and share your story of faith.

footer.churchNotice: Course content is provided by and is the intellectual property of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints.
footer.educationalNotice: Educational project for GESCI110: Sustaining Human Life - Brigham Young University-Idaho

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our emotional resilience platform.

educationalProject.title: Educational Project Information
educationalProject.content: This platform is an educational project developed as part of the GESCI110: Sustaining Human Life course at Brigham Young University - Idaho (BYUI). This project is created for academic purposes and to demonstrate practical application of course concepts in emotional resilience and human wellbeing.

points.purpose: Purpose: Educational demonstration and learning project
points.academic: This is an academic project and not a commercial platform

contentAttribution.title: Content Attribution and Source
contentAttribution.content: The educational content, courses, and materials provided on this platform are derived from and based upon the intellectual property of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints. Specifically:
contentAttribution.point1: All course content is sourced from official The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints emotional resilience training materials
contentAttribution.point2: The Church retains all intellectual property rights to the original content
contentAttribution.point3: This platform serves as a delivery mechanism and does not claim ownership of the educational materials

personal.title: Personal Information
personal.content: We may collect personal information such as your name, email address, and progress data to provide personalized experiences and track your learning journey.

usage.title: Usage Data
usage.content: We collect information about how you interact with our platform, including pages visited, time spent, and course progress to improve our services.

howWeUse.title: How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.point1: To provide and maintain our services
howWeUse.point3: To communicate with you about your progress and platform updates
howWeUse.point4: To improve our platform and develop new features

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing and Third Parties
dataSharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share aggregated, non-personally identifiable information for research and improvement purposes.
dataSharing.churchData: Please note that while we use The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints educational content, we do not share your personal data with The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints unless explicitly required by law.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.portability: Request a copy of your data

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at jorgechvzpon@gmail.com

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using this emotional resilience platform, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.

educationalProject.title: Educational Project Disclaimer
educationalProject.content: This platform is developed as an educational project for the GESCI110: Sustaining Human Life course at Brigham Young University - Idaho (BYUI).
educationalProject.academicPurpose: Academic Purpose: This project serves as a practical demonstration of course concepts related to emotional resilience, human wellbeing, and community support systems.
educationalProject.limitations: Educational Limitations: As an academic project, this platform may have limited functionality and is primarily intended for demonstration and learning purposes rather than as a fully operational commercial service.
educationalProject.byuiInfo: Course Information: GESCI110 - Sustaining Human Life, Brigham Young University - Idaho

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property and Content Attribution
intellectualProperty.churchContent: The educational content, courses, materials, and curriculum available on this platform are derived from and based upon the intellectual property of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints. The Church retains all rights, title, and interest in and to the original content.

restrictions.title: Content Use Restrictions
restrictions.commercial: You may not use the educational content for commercial purposes
restrictions.modification: You may not modify, adapt, or create derivative works from the content
restrictions.redistribution: You may not redistribute or republish the content outside this platform
restrictions.attribution: Proper attribution to The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints must be maintained

intellectualProperty.platformCode: The platform code and user interface elements are developed independently and are not affiliated with or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints.

useOfServices.title: Use of Services
useOfServices.content: This platform is intended for personal emotional resilience education and self-improvement. You agree to use the services responsibly and in accordance with all applicable laws.

prohibited.title: Prohibited Uses
prohibited.harmful: Transmitting harmful, threatening, or offensive content
prohibited.impersonate: Impersonating others or providing false information
prohibited.interfere: Interfering with the platform's functionality or security

userContent.title: User-Generated Content
userContent.responsibility: You are responsible for any content you post or share on the platform. You warrant that you have the right to share such content.
userContent.license: By posting content, you grant us a non-exclusive license to use, modify, and display your content in connection with operating the platform.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: The information and content provided on this platform are for educational purposes only and should not be considered as professional medical or psychological advice. Always consult with qualified professionals for specific mental health concerns.
disclaimer.churchEndorsement: This platform is not officially endorsed by or affiliated with The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints, despite using their educational materials as source content.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: We shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use of the platform or any content therein.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your access to the platform at any time, without prior notice, for conduct that we believe violates these Terms of Service.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will be effective when posted on the platform. Your continued use constitutes acceptance of modified terms.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: For questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at jorgechvzpon@gmail.com

courses.title: Emotional Resilience Courses
courses.description: Explore our courses designed to help you build emotional and spiritual resilience.
courses.notFoundDesc: The course you are looking for doesn't exist or may have been moved.
courses.enrollmentRequired: You need to enroll in this course to access the content.
courses.videoPlaceholder: The lesson video would be displayed here.
courses.contentPlaceholder: The lesson content would be displayed here.
courses.lessonExplores: This lesson explores the key concepts of
courses.andApplication: and how they apply to your daily life. You'll learn practical strategies that you can implement immediately to build your emotional resilience.
courses.takeaway2: Practical techniques you can apply in your daily life
courses.takeaway3: Common challenges and how to overcome them
courses.takeaway4: Building sustainable habits for long-term resilience
courses.notesDesc: Take notes as you go through the lesson. Your notes are private and will help you remember key points.
courses.discussionDesc: Join the discussion with other students. Share your insights and questions about this lesson.
courses.discussionPlaceholder: The discussion forum would be displayed here, allowing students to interact with each other.
courses.selectNote: Select a note from the list or create a new one
courses.noNotesDescription: You haven't created any notes for this lesson yet. Click the button above to create your first one!
courses.errorMissingInfoOnDelete: Missing information needed to delete note

pageTitle.title: Support Groups Near You
pageTitle.subtitle: Connect with local resilience groups in your neighborhood or join virtual sessions from anywhere. Find your tribe and grow stronger together.
pageTitle.disclaimer: Note: The groups shown are fictitious and are for illustrative purposes only. Real-life groups will be added soon.

search.placeholder: Search by location, group name, focus area, or facilitator...

callToAction.title: Don't see a group near you?
callToAction.description: Starting a support group in your community is easier than you think. We provide resources, training, and ongoing support for community leaders.

expectItems.discussions: Guided discussions on key resilience topics.
expectItems.environment: A supportive and confidential environment for sharing.
expectItems.connections: Opportunities to connect with peers facing similar challenges.

details.noReviews: No reviews yet for this group.
details.noSimilarGroups: No similar groups found at this time.

blogs.shareExperience: Share your experience to inspire and support others in the community
blogs.titlePlaceholder: Give your story a compelling title...
blogs.storyPlaceholder: Share your journey, challenges, insights, and how you've built resilience. Be authentic and specific - your story could be exactly what someone else needs to hear today...

beSpecific.title: Be specific
beSpecific.description: Share concrete examples and details that others can relate to.

focusOnGrowth.title: Focus on growth
focusOnGrowth.description: Highlight what you learned and how you've changed.

beAuthentic.title: Be authentic
beAuthentic.description: Vulnerability creates connection and helps others feel less alone.

includeHope.title: Include hope
includeHope.description: Share what gives you strength or what you'd tell someone in a similar situation.
